gw.api.print

Class WidgetPrintException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.io.IOException
          • gw.pl.util.IOExceptionWithCause
            • gw.api.print.PrintException
              • gw.api.print.WidgetPrintException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WidgetPrintException
extends PrintException
    Wrapper exception specifically for widget printing. Keeps track of the widget-in-question when an exception is encountered as well as the file and line number it occurs.
    Author:
    pyoung
